description: Example images for AI anime generator showcase (unauthenticated users)

parameters.prompt:
A young female celestial warrior standing on a colossal floating stone platform above a sea of clouds at night. 
Long silver hair flowing down to her waist, glowing blue eyes, calm and determined expression. 
Wearing a white and silver armored dress with elegant metallic details, flowing translucent cape, silver gauntlets and knee-high armored boots. 
A radiant crystal crown floating slightly above her head. 
Behind her, a massive glowing moon and a vast star-filled sky with nebula clouds. 
Epic fantasy atmosphere, ultra detailed, cinematic lighting, volumetric moonlight beams, dramatic scale, anime-inspired high detail illustration.

examples.alt: boy and girl meeting ai cinematic anime style
examples.title: boy and girl  meeting on a train platform

a confident school girl on a rooftop at sunset, long hair and ribbon lifted by wind, one hand holding a school bag strap, city skyline glowing in the distance, floating petals and tiny light particles around her, warm golden-hour lighting, three-quarter portrait framing, clear emotional expression, elegant pose, bright and clean details.
A girl standing under cherry blossom trees in a park, smiling and waving
A girl in a flowing, patterned qipao, holding a colorful paper umbrella, walking along a stone path in a serene garden
